article_title: What H&R Block says about PPACA
article_text:
(AP Photo/Mark Lennihan)

H&R Block is looking at the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act as a chance to attracts tens of thousands of people to its brick-and-mortar offices.

The tax-preparation firm is holding free PPACA tax advice sessions -- from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. Thursday -- at about 10,000 of its offices.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: What H&R Block is saying about PPACA and current tax filing season.
